articles.author: ICC
articles.title: 'Virat is perfect for No. 4' says AB de Villiers - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Former South Africa superstar AB de Villiers has suggested Virat Kohli could be the answer to India’s No.4 conundrum at the World Cup.
articles.content: Former South Africa superstar AB de Villiers has suggested Virat Kohli could be the answer to Indias No.4 conundrum at the World Cup.Speaking on his Youtube channel 'AB de Villiers 360, Kohlis former… [+1643 chars]
